title: A comment to "A General Theory of IR Evaluation Measures". (arXiv:2303.16061v1 [cs.IR])
abstract: The paper "A General Theory of IR Evaluation Measures" develops a formal framework to determine whether IR evaluation measures are interval scales. This comment shows some limitations about its conclusions.
context:
Title: A comment to "A General Theory of IR Evaluation Measures". (arXiv:2303.16061v1 [cs.IR])
Abstract: The paper "A General Theory of IR Evaluation Measures" develops a formal framework to determine whether IR evaluation measures are interval scales. This comment shows some limitations about its conclusions.
translated_title: 一篇《关于IR评估方法的一般理论》的评论
translated_abstract: 本文“一般的IR评估方法理论”开发了一个形式化的框架，以确定IR评估方法是否为区间刻度。本评论显示了一些关于其结论的限制。
tldr: 本文是一篇对于《关于IR评估方法的一般理论》的评论，指出了它的结论存在一些限制。
en_tdlr: This paper is a comment on "A General Theory of IR Evaluation Measures", highlighting some limitations in its conclusions.
